participant_1.background:
I remember playing the violin for my family at the holidays and seeing the look on their faces as they listened.
i feel that i can t live up to many people s standards.
I enjoy listening to Jason Mraz's music to help me cope with the loss of my parents.
I like to dye my hair fire engine red, because it's bold and makes me feel like I can take on anything.
I enjoy entertaining my former students and catching up on their lives.

participant_2.background:
I realized that I have more control over my life than I thought I did.
i hope to someday compete professionally or atleast qualify for an event.
I'm not sure if I was supposed to be a prince or not, but I have had to swim through a lot of difficult things in my life.
I play the piano, but only at home because caffeine makes my hands shake.
I played my guitar to my cat before bed last night.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
Pretty great actually! I recently had a realization that I have more control over my life than I thought I did, and it's made all the difference.
That's awesome! I'm glad to hear that. I'm having a pretty good day too. I just got back from a long run, and I'm feeling pretty good about myself.
That's great! I love running, but I don't get to do it as often as I'd like. What kind of music do you listen to when you run?
I listen to a lot of different things, but I usually listen to Jason Mraz when I run. His music always gets me pumped up and ready to go.
I love Jason Mraz! He's one of my favorite artists. I've seen him in concert twice, and it was amazing.
I've never seen him in concert, but I've always wanted to. He seems like he would put on a great show.
He definitely does. He's so energetic and talented.
I'm glad you're having a great day! I hope it continues to go well.
Thanks! I hope yours does too.
